txt.en: 'My sword is ready!'
'I am ready to fight!'

'You have returned just in time, my friend! They prepare another assault!'

<rgb=#00FF00>There are two ways to participate in the defence of the Deeping Wall. You can speak to Thurketel for the Storied Tale, a story-focused experience. Or you can use the Epic Battles Panel for a more gameplay-intensive experience.</rgb>

<rgb=#FF0000>To participate in the defence of the Deeping Wall, open the Epic Battles Panel and select 'The Deeping Wall' from the menu. After you successfully complete the defence, you will be returned to the location from which you entered it.</rgb>
Book 13, Chapter 6: Atop the Wall
'The postern gate, you say? I am ready!'
'We will attack through the postern gate? Aye, I am with you!'
Talk to Aragorn by the postern gate below the north-west tower
Complete 'The Deeping Wall' from the Epic Battles Panel
'Éomer is fortunate I was there!'

'We need to set the forces of Saruman back on their heels, [placeholder]. Descend to the open space between the wall and the Hornburg, and speak with any swordsmen you see. Tell them to meet me by the postern gate. I wish to lead them on a sortie against the Orcs!'
Talk to Legolas atop the Deeping Wall
Talk to Thurketel and complete 'Storied Tale: The Deeping Wall' <rgb=#00FF00>OR</rgb> complete 'The Deeping Wall' from the Epic Battles Panel
'Find swordsmen willing to accompany me on a sortie against the Orcs. Tell them to meet me at the postern gate, if they are able and ready!'
Complete 'The Deeping Wall' from the Epic Battles Panel
'DNT - Blah!'

'These swordsmen will accompany me, [placeholder], and Éomer has pledged his sword as well! But I wish for you to return to Legolas atop the wall and watch our sortie from above! There will be fighting enough for all of us, I do not doubt it!'
'Return to Legolas and assist him with the defence of the Deeping Wall! We will strike a blow against the Orcs from the postern gate, and may it prove a worthy distraction!'
Talk to Éomer by the postern gate

'You have returned just in time, my friend! They prepare another assault!'

<rgb=#00FF00>There are two ways to participate in the defence of the Deeping Wall. You can speak to Thurketel for the Storied Tale, a story-focused experience. Or you can use the Epic Battles Panel for a more gameplay-intensive experience.</rgb>

<rgb=#FF0000>To participate in the defence of the Deeping Wall, open the Epic Battles Panel and select 'The Deeping Wall' from the menu. After you successfully complete the defence, you will be returned to the location from which you entered it.</rgb>
'DNT - Blah!'
Aragorn has decided to lead a sortie through the postern gate in the Deeping Wall, in order to strike against the forces of Saruman.

'We felt the blast from here, [placeholder]! I am glad you survived.\n\n'Our own sortie did not go well. The causeway is hard-pressed, and the hinges and bars of the main gates have greatly suffered. We scattered a number of Orcs who carried rams, and the archers supporting them, but our victory was short-lived. As we attempted to return, I was tripped by Orcs lying in ambush, and it nearly spelled my end.'
DNT - Blah!
'We survived the assault, for now. Did Aragorn and Éomer fare as well as we did? Go to the postern gate in the north-west tower and see if their sortie led to victory.'
DNT - Blah!
DNT - Blah!
DNT - Blah!
'I will go with Aragorn! This is the hour! We will teach the enemy a lesson in steel!'

It is after midnight at Helm's Deep. Rohirric Swordsmen can be found in the open space between the Hornburg and the Deeping Wall.\n\nAragorn has asked you to gather swordsmen to accompany him on a sortie beyond the wall.
It is after midnight at Helm's Deep. Legolas is atop the Deeping Wall, accessible from ground-level by the eastern staircase.\n\nAragorn has sent you to watch over the battle alongside Legolas.

It is after midnight at Helm's Deep. Aragorn and Éomer are by the postern gate, below the north-west tower.\n\nYou have given word to several swordsmen that Aragorn plans a sortie through the postern gate, and should see if that be enough.
Find swordsmen and tell them to meet Aragorn at the postern gate ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

It is after midnight at Helm's Deep.

<rgb=#00FF00>There are two ways to participate in the defence of the Deeping Wall. You can speak to Thurketel for the Storied Tale, a story-focused experience. Or you can use the Epic Battles Panel for a more gameplay-intensive experience.</rgb>

<rgb=#FF0000>To participate in the defence of the Deeping Wall, open the Epic Battles Panel and select 'The Deeping Wall' from the menu. After you successfully complete the defence, you will be returned to the location from which you entered it.</rgb>
Éomer is below the north-west tower, by the postern gate.\n\nYou have survived an attack on the Deeping Wall, and should see how Éomer and Aragorn fared in their sortie.
'Gúthwinë is with you!'
'Éomer!' Aragorn cries, 'This is the hour in which we draw swords together!'
'The Orcs are bringing up great ladders with which to scale the Deeping Wall! Prepare for battle!'
'I am ready!'
'I will accompany Éomer on this attack!'
'Éomer and Aragorn will have my sword!'
